Klant: I was a general in an army, and eventually after the passing of the =
leader, I was in command. They overthrew me after my years of service in or=
der to not follow me. Every one of them are dead now, died in the next atta=
ck. Came to Earth to help the Maximals, I did, but it seemed that they didn=
't care. They were even letting prisoners rot in their cells. I killed one =
of the worst ones. Deplorable, those Maximals, yet quite uncaring if someth=
ing would happen to any of their comrades. Enough happened to them before m=
y eyes and they wouldn't help each other. Ha...


  ----- Original Message =
----- 
  From: Alloran2@... 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Wedn=
esday, May 23, 2001 9:42 PM
  Subject: Torca


  :::Torca::: 

  ::As they =
walked Torca looked to Klant:: 
  Torca: Hey Klant, i just realized somethi=
ng.  We've been friends for awhile 
  now, but with all the battles, you ne=
ver told me about yourself. How'd you 
  get to Earth? What happened to you=
 before this war? 
  Your use of Yahoo! Groups is subject to the Yahoo! Ter=
ms of Service.
